description: scene} is one of the most popular datasets from the multimedia domain, belonging to the subcategory of images. It provides a very intuitive way to depict the aim of MLC. The dataset is about the classification of different scenes on an image. There are a total of 6 labels beach, sunset, fall foliage, field, mountain and urban. The images are described with 294 features derived from LUV space.
name: scene
